title: The Scalp Hunter: Episode 185
description:
John Sweeney is a cruel, violent and arrogant man. In this episode of the UK True Crime Podcast, we look at the stories of the two women he is known to have killed, another he tried to kill, and look at other potential victims.

This episode was recorded live for supporters on Patreon.
